name: Aztin_Maru
content:
Aztin Maru was a Human male who lived on Naboo's moon of Rori during the time of the Galactic Civil War. After the Battle of Yavin, Maru was part of Vladlun's gang, a minor criminal group led by Vladlun Travan. In 1 ABY, Dabrini and two other associates of Travan, Titus Dabrini and Tiaba Charr, had earned a death mark. The bounty hunter Boba Fett therefore traveled to Rori in order to collect the bounties for the three criminals. However, after tracking them to Vladlun Travan's Hideout, Fett decided to let a spacer who was investigating the bunker do his dirty work and take out the bounty targets. Aztin Maru was finally killed by the spacer.
Aztin Maru was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Aztin Maru was added to the game with the release of the "Game Update 12", on August 10, 2009.
